values: （为画像、摄影）摆姿势；质询；提出（问题或挑战）；造成（困难、威胁、问题或困难）；形成挑战；使为难；使困惑；假装；冒充；装模作样
（为画像、拍照等摆的）姿势；造型

synonym.mean: 造成，形成；摆姿势；装模作样；提出…讨论

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 位置，方位；职位，工作；姿态；站位；vt. 安置；把……放在适当位置
实证主义；实证论；积极性；武断
难题；装腔作势者；不易处理的事

word_group.brief_definition: 带来风险；构成风险；构成威胁

bilingual.source: He puts the character into a pose.
bilingual.target: 他将角色摆成一个姿势。

bilingual.source: Pupils can pose while they sing the song.
bilingual.target: 学生们可以在唱歌时摆姿势。

bilingual.source: She likes to pose in front of the camera.
bilingual.target: 她喜欢在镜头前摆姿势。
模特在拍摄时需要摆姿势。

bilingual.source: The kids pose for pictures in the park.
bilingual.target: 孩子们在公园里摆姿势拍照。
舞者们在舞台上优雅地摆姿势。

bilingual.source: She asked the model to pose for the painting.
bilingual.target: 她请模特为这幅画摆姿势。

bilingual.source: She always pose with a smile in photos.
bilingual.target: 她在照片中总是带着微笑摆姿势。

bilingual.source: The photographer asked her to pose for the picture.
bilingual.target: 摄影师让她摆姿势拍照。

bilingual.source: The photographer instructed him to pose naturally.
bilingual.target: 摄影师指导他自然地摆姿势。

list.abstract: pose（英[pəʊz]，美[poʊz]），英语单词，动词是指形成、构成、摆出姿态；名词是指姿势、卖弄、举止。短语搭配有pose as（冒充）。例句有“Batteries can pose a particular danger.（电池会造成特别的危险。）” pose的动词类近义词有take shape等；名词类有attitude等；不及物动词类有posture。
《Pose》（ポーズ）是由冈崎体育填词谱曲并演唱的一首歌曲，是动画《精灵宝可梦：太阳&月亮》的第一首ED。

yingyinNormal.en: But it was all worth it because you're a famous fossil! Now, you better hold that pose!
yingyinNormal.zh: 当这一切都值得因为你成了著名的化石！现在，最好保持那个姿势！

yingyinNormal.en: You guys aren't doing the dramatic pose, are you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们没摆华丽的造型，对吧？

yingyinNormal.en: These diet beverages still pose serious health risks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但这些无糖饮料依旧威胁着你的健康。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《可口可乐史上最诚实的广告》

yingyinNormal.en: Do we have to strike a pose every time we land?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们需要每次出场都摆个造型吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Today we're gonna be working on managing our anger through movement. The first pose is the dancer pose. Great form, Terence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天我们一起学习一个方法来管理我们的愤怒，用肢体活动，第一个动作，叫做舞者式，做得很好，大红。

yingyinNormal.en: Our orders are to defeat them before they pose an irreversible threat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的任务是在他们成为真正威胁之前消灭他们。

yingyinNormal.en: And if left unchecked they could pose a growing threat to the United States.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们疏于防范，他们就可能坐大而威胁合众国的安全。

yingyinNormal.en: Then it's just Q&A, quiz, safety drills pose for commemorative group photo and we're off.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就是些问答，测试，安全演习，拍张团体纪念照，就能出发了。

yingyinNormal.en: And, if left unchecked these terrorists could pose a growing threat beyond the Middle East, including to the United States.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因此，如果疏于防范，这些恐怖力量将形成持续增长的威胁，并超越中东的地理限制，威胁到合众国本土。

yingyinNormal.en: Excuse me? We're also gonna need you to pose for some publicity photos next to the picture of yourself. Not a chance in hell.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你说什么？我们还需要你拍摄一些宣传照，摆放在你的照片旁边。想都别想。

yingyinNormal.en: Right now, they pose a threat to the people of Iraq, Syria, and the broader Middle East. But its leaders have threatened America and our allies.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，他们正在威胁伊拉克、叙利亚和其它中东地区人民的安宁。但该组织的领导多次扬言要袭击美国和我们的盟友。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course, this was a major concern for our ancestors who ran around naked, but for us underwear or pant wearing folks, farts don't pose a real threat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，对衣不蔽体、光溜溜跑来跑去的祖先来说，这点很值得担心，但对有穿衣服的现代人来说，放屁不构成太大威胁。

yingyinNormal.en: That's all I dream about is hitting the game winner And then doing some cool little dorky pose And then walking off. You know, that's, like, all I did growing up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我梦寐以求的，就是投进这样的制胜球再摆出搞怪的动作，然后帅气地走回去像我小时候那样

yingyinNormal.en: So after they do this lottery, they pose the sign on this two unions about who are the lucky students, who won the lottery, and who are the unlucky students, who did not win the lottery.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以在抽签过后，他们对这两个群体进行标记记录，哪些是抽中球票的幸运儿，哪些比较倒霉没抽到票。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 位置；方位；地点；姿势；位置安排；安置方式；处境；状况；观点；立场；头寸；额度；持有状态；命题；原则；主张

word_family.mean: v. 形成；构成；摆出姿态；把…难住；使为难；冒充；装腔作势；假装；卖弄；提出

sense_info_list.en: be the cause of something such as a problem, threat, danger, or challenge

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Pose</highlight> a challenge to its farming industry
<highlight>Pose</highlight> a threat to the state government
The coming use of autonomous vehicles, for example, <highlight>poses</highlight> thorny ethical questions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，即将到来的自动驾驶车辆的使用造成了棘手的伦理问题。

sense_info_list.en: assume a particular position for artistic purpose

examination_example.sentence: My collection of "Smiling Victorians" makes up a tiny percentage of the catalog, the majority of which show sitters <highlight>posing</highlight> miserably in front of backdrops.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我收藏的 "微笑的维多利亚人" 在目录中只占很小的比例，其中大部分都是坐着的人在背景前痛苦地摆姿势。

sense_info_list.en: set forth or offer for attention or consideration

word_usage.usage:
pose可用作及物动词，也可用作不及物动词。用作及物动词时，可接名词或代词作宾语，pose常与介词to搭配构成pose sth. to sb.，指“给……带来……/对……构成……”，例：
The chemicals pose little risk to human health.
这些化学药品对人类健康没有什么危害。

direction_info.description:

assume a particular position for artistic purpose

examination_example.sentence: Once we scale up, algorithms must be sensitive to tiny changes in identities and at the same time invariant to lighting, <highlight>pose</highlight>, age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦我们扩大数据库，算法必须对面部特征的微小差异十分敏感，同时不受光线、姿势和年龄的影响。

sense_info_list.en: set forth or offer for attention or consideration

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 位置；方位；地点；姿势；位置安排；安置方式；处境；状况；观点；立场；头寸；额度；持有状态；命题；原则；主张

word_family.mean: v. 形成；构成；摆出姿态；把…难住；使为难；冒充；装腔作势；假装；卖弄；提出

sense_info_list.en: be the cause of something such as a problem; threat; danger; or challenge

examination_example.sentence_trans: 电池会造成一种特别的危险。

examination_example.sentence: It could <highlight>pose</highlight> a threat to other marine species.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可能对其他海洋物种造成威胁。

examination_example.sentence: Of all those trends, however, the spread of water shortages <highlight>poses</highlight> the most immediate threat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，在所有这些趋势中，水资源短缺的蔓延构成了最直接的威胁。

sense_info_list.en: set forth or offer for attention or consideration

examination_example.sentence: From 1800 to the present day, textbooks have done this by <highlight>posing</highlight> questions for students to answer inductively (归纳性地) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从1800年至今，教科书通过“提出让学生做出归纳性回答的问题”实现了这一点。

examination_example.sentence: The goal of Professor Godel's virtual assistant next year is to take over answering 40% of all the questions <highlight>posed</highlight> by students on the online forum.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 戈德尔教授的虚拟助手明年的目标是回答学生在在线论坛上提出的所有问题的40%。

sense_info_list.en: assume a particular position for artistic purpose

exam_freq_info.chinese: 提出; 造成(威胁、问题等)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: Of course - I shouldn't have asked A full-length <highlight>pose</highlight> would be much too big a project for a young woman your size.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然——我不应该要求你摆个全身姿势对你这样身材的年轻女人来说太过分了。

examination_example.sentence: How could I possibly take the time to <highlight>pose</highlight> for a sculpture now?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我现在怎么可能有时间为雕塑摆姿势呢？

sense_info_list.zh: 提出; 造成(威胁、问题等)

exam_freq_info.chinese: (使)摆好姿势; 姿势; 装腔作势

examination_example.sentence: You can <highlight>pose</highlight> in a variety of positions with your arms and legs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以用胳膊和腿摆出各种姿势。
